text:
e="preserve">Albert Ely Edwards (March 19, 1937 – April 29, 2020) was an American politician and businessman. He was born in Houston, Texas. He was a member of the Texas House of Representatives from 1978 to 2007 and again from 2009 to 2011. Edwards was a member of the Democratic Party.
Edwards died on April 29, 2020 at the age of 83.
